caller_intent: Scotty wants to pay his insurance premium in full, confirm the payment method, and ensure the policy starts on the correct date after his current policy expires.
resolution_steps: Agent verifies Scotty's account and confirms the payment amount ($3,398.06).
Scotty provides credit card details (number, expiration, CVV) for payment.
Agent confirms the policy will take effect on the same date as the current policy's expiration.
Agent promises to email the application, ID card, and receipt for electronic signature.
summary: Scotty confirms payment of his insurance premium in full using a credit card. The agent verifies details, confirms policy effective date alignment, and promises to send required documents via email. The call concludes with holiday greetings and confirmation of next steps.
